title: Miley Cyrus to touch upon Liam Hemsworth and Kaitlynn Carter splits in new music
text:
From Cosmopolitan

She's been through two break-ups in the past few months, so it comes as no surprise that Miley Cyrus has plenty of album material ready to record.

The singer, 26, has reportedly returned to the recording studio to write new songs following her splits from Liam Hemsworth and Kaitlynn Carter.

Earlier this week, it was announced Miley and Kaitlynn put an end to their whirlwind six-week romance.

And while their split may still be fresh, there's plenty of material to inspire her from the breakdown of her marriage to actor Liam, too.

Photo credit: Dia Dipasupil - Getty Images More

A music source told The Sun : "Miley has been back in the studio recording new music because the other songs she had made are so far removed from who she is right now.

"A lot has changed in the past few months and it would be strange for her to release the EPs as they were.

"Now she's deciding whether to update the collections with new songs or to start something else."

Miley left fans heartbroken after a rep confirmed to People that it was all over between her and Liam.

The pair, who appeared stronger than ever after tying the knot last year, addressed the split on social media, with Liam writing, "Hi all. Just a quick note to say that Miley and I have recently separated and I wish her nothing but health and happiness going forward.

"This is a private matter and I have not made, nor will I be making, any comments to any journalists or media outlets. Any reported quotes attributed to me are false. Peace and Love."

But it didn't take long for Miley to move on after being pictured getting cosy with Kaitlynn, who was previously married to Brody Jenner, on a yacht in August.

Despite the internet going crazy for Miley' and Kaitlynn, the saucy snaps appeared to be a deal breaker for ex Liam (sob!).

Photo credit: Instagram/Kaitlynn Carter More

E! reported that the photos of Kaitlynn and Miley kissing pushed him to make the move for divorce.

“Even though Miley and Liam were separated for a while before she was photographed making out on the yacht with Kaitlynn, once Liam saw those photos, he decided it was time to file for divorce,” a source says. “That was it for him, seeing those photos and then all the Soho House stories thereafter.”

We're sure Miley will be able to make an entire collection of albums with this drama.
